org.epics.pvData.pvCopy
Interface PVCopy

public interface PVCopy

This interface maps between a PVRecord and a PVStructure that holds a copy of a subset of the data in the PVRecord.

Author:
mrk

Method Summary

Method Detail

getPVRecord

PVRecord getPVRecord()
Get the PVRecord to which this PVCopy is attached.

Returns:
The interface.

getStructure

Structure getStructure()
Get the introspection interface for the set of fields describing the subset of the fields from PVRecord which a PVStructure contains.

Returns:
The introspection interface.

createPVStructure

PVStructure createPVStructure()
Create a PVStructure which can hold a subset of the data from the PVRecord. A client may require multiple PVStructures. For example if a monitor request supports a queue than a PVStructure is required for each queue element.

Returns:
The interface.

getCopyOffset

int getCopyOffset(PVField recordPVField)
Given a PVField from the record determine the offset within the PVStructure where the copy of the data is located. PVStructure.getSubField(offset) can be called to locate the PVField within the PVStructure.

Parameters:
recordPVField - The PVField within PVRecord.
Returns:
The offset or -1 if the field in the record does not have a copy in the PVStructure.

getCopyOffset

int getCopyOffset(PVStructure recordPVStructure,
                  PVField recordPVField)
Given a recordPVField within a recordPVStructure determine the offset within the PVStructure where the copy of the data is located. PVStructure.getSubField(offset) can be called to locate the PVField within the PVStructure.

Parameters:
recordPVStructure - The PVStructure within the PVRecord.
recordPVField - The PVField within the recordPVStructure.
Returns:
The offset or -1 if the field in the record does not have a copy in the PVStructure.

getRecordPVField

PVField getRecordPVField(int structureOffset)
Given an offset within a PVStructure return the corresponding PVField in the PVRecord.

Parameters:
structureOffset - The offset within the PVStructure.
Returns:
The interface within the PVRecord.

initCopy

void initCopy(PVStructure copyPVStructure,
              BitSet bitSet,
              boolean lockRecord)
Initialize PVStructure with the current data from the PVRecord. The bitSet will have offset 0 set to 1 and all other bits set to 0.

Parameters:
copyPVStructure - The PVStructure.
bitSet - The bitSet for PVStructure.
lockRecord - lock the record while initializing.

updateCopySetBitSet

void updateCopySetBitSet(PVStructure copyPVStructure,
                         BitSet bitSet,
                         boolean lockRecord)
Update PVStructure from PVRecord. The BitSet shows which fields in PVStructure have changed.

Parameters:
copyPVStructure - The PVStructure.
bitSet - The BitSet which shows the fields that were modified.
lockRecord - lock the record while updating.

updateCopyFromBitSet

void updateCopyFromBitSet(PVStructure copyPVStructure,
                          BitSet bitSet,
                          boolean lockRecord)
Update PVStructure from the bitSet. Thus each PVField of PVStructure for which bitSet.get(pvField.getOffset) is true is updated with the data from the PVRecord.

Parameters:
copyPVStructure - The PVStructure.
bitSet - The bitSet which shows which fields should be updated.
lockRecord - Should the pvRecord be locked while updating.

updateRecord

void updateRecord(PVStructure copyPVStructure,
                  BitSet bitSet,
                  boolean lockRecord)
Update the fields in PVRecord with data from PVStructure. Only fields that have the offset in bitSet set to true are modified.

Parameters:
copyPVStructure - The PVStructure.
bitSet - The offsets within PVStructure that have new data.
lockRecord - lock the record while updating.

createPVCopyMonitor

PVCopyMonitor createPVCopyMonitor(PVCopyMonitorRequester pvCopyMonitorRequester)
Create a PVCopyMonitor.

Parameters:
pvCopyMonitorRequester - The PVCopyMonitorRequester.
Returns:
The PVCopyMonitor.

isShared

boolean isShared()
Are the PVStructures being created to share data?

Returns:
isShared.
